members.name: Jonathan Malmin
members.bio_short: Jonathan Malmin, a seasoned builder, created the 7 Day Kitchen concept, offering high-quality, efficient remodels with a customer-first approach built on trust and clear communication.
members.bio: Jonathan Malmin is a local builder specializing in kitchens, custom renovations, and bespoke new homes. With a passion for craftsmanship and a foundation built on trust, Jonathan and his team create spaces that foster connection and facilitate relationships. Together with a dedicated team of skilled tradespeople, they pride themselves on timely communication, efficient schedule management, and delivering projects within budget, ensuring that every project is a collaborative and rewarding experience for clients. Over the years, Jonathan has successfully completed more than 100 projects, including custom kitchen remodels, whole-home renovations, new construction builds, and larger developments such as multi-family residences and commercial properties. This diverse portfolio has prepared him to take on projects of any size or complexity, managing unique challenges and delivering tailored solutions to align with each client’s vision. Jonathan’s entrepreneurial journey began in middle school, mowing lawns for neighbors and learning the importance of punctuality, clear communication, reliability, and taking responsibility—values that remain at the heart of his work. These lessons laid the foundation for a customer-first approach, where every project is not only a construction endeavor but also an opportunity to build lasting relationships. For Jonathan, success is measured by completing each project with a stronger bond with his customers than when it began. A graduate of Georgia State University, Jonathan has been providing quality home construction services in Atlanta since 2008. Starting as a trim carpenter, he steadily expanded his skills and expertise to include all aspects of renovations and new construction. His extensive experience and passion for delivering excellence make him the ideal partner for creating homes and developments that are as functional as they are beautiful.
members.title: Chief Executive Officer

members.name: Alex Thompson
members.bio_short: Dedicated to helping homeowners find the perfect kitchen solutions within their budget.
members.bio: With over 8 years of experience in kitchen sales and design, Alex specializes in creating customized solutions that perfectly match each client's needs and budget. Known for building lasting relationships with clients and ensuring their vision becomes reality.
members.title: Senior Sales Associate

members.name: Maria Garcia
members.bio_short: Passionate about creating dream kitchens that combine functionality with style.
members.bio: Maria brings fresh perspectives to kitchen design with her background in interior design. She excels at helping clients visualize their perfect kitchen and making it a reality within their budget.
members.title: Sales Associate

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.bio_short: Creating functional and beautiful kitchen spaces for over a decade.
members.bio: Sarah brings her extensive background in interior design and kitchen ergonomics to create spaces that are both beautiful and highly functional.
members.title: Senior Kitchen Designer

members.name: Michael Chen
members.bio_short: Ensuring seamless execution of kitchen renovations from start to finish.
members.bio: Michael excels at coordinating complex renovation projects, ensuring timely completion while maintaining the highest quality standards.
members.title: Senior Project Manager

members.name: Emily Rodriguez
members.bio_short: Dedicated to providing exceptional customer service throughout the renovation journey.
members.bio: Emily ensures every client receives personalized attention and support throughout their renovation journey, making the process smooth and enjoyable.
members.title: Client Relations Manager
